text: John Kevin Hagy (born December 9, 1965) is a former professional American football player who spent three seasons in the National Football League with the Buffalo Bills from 1988 to 1990. Hagy appeared in a total of 28 career games, including 11 starts. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1965 births Category:Buffalo Bills players Category:American football defensive backs Category:Texas Longhorns football players
title: John Hagy
